string-array.name: newsitems
string-array.item: Customer service representative finds peace in Android game
Giant corporation hires more minions to take customer care calls
Worthless employees earn company billions in revenue
Finding work for the homeless, MegaBIG hires new customer service reps
Understaffed and undercompensated employees, Bish Wireless finds they dont care
Call center fire reported by no-one, because DynaCorpBig Inc. forgot about them.
EARN MORE $$$ WORK AS CUSTOMER SERVICE MINION
WANT $$$? BISH is HIRING for CUSTOMER SERVICE at COMPETITIVE fast food MANAGER wages!
Your AD here. Your AD here. Give $$$ for your AD here.
Another customer service representative hangs up on customer. No one surprised.
Call the law firm of Pooter and Pootmore if hung up on by customer service.
Really lame corporation does not pay support technicians. Provides gruel allowance.
Packaged deal includes phone, internet, tv, coffee, bread, soap, and lighting.
Sign up now for only 129.99. 100 year contract. Terms may change. Yes they will.
CEO of BigOl Broadband Inc. looks lost in carefree photo with humans.
Election coverage bores populace to the point of calling customer service.
Customer service employee looks for love in all the wrong places.
Find a date now. Wait a minute. You married! Get lost loser!
Follow election coverage for some reason. As if you care.
Computer virus detected, for real guys. Only 10 FitCoins for antidote. Pay now.
Find a date now. Wait a minute. You married! Get lost loser!
Company loses faith in customer service. Blames customer and service.
Customer is always wrong after all.
This just in... Never call customer service.
New record as customer waits on hold for more than eight years.
Customer Service Reps may eventually get paid real wages. Eventually.
Big Billys Big Bacon Burger stand NOW HIRING.
Giant global megadish directnet hiring now. Earn REAL food rations.
